description: Danes and Norwegians can holiday in each other's country from mid-June, but Swedes are left out.
title: Coronavirus: Denmark and Norway exclude Sweden from tourism
title_page: Coronavirus: Denmark and Norway exclude Sweden from tourism - BBC News
maintext: Tourists from those countries cannot stay the night in Copenhagen, which has the most coronavirus cases. Danes can travel to those two countries too, without having to go into quarantine on their return.
